results.content:
I cannot believe Udemy will allow this kind of stuff. 
I read the description I also listened to the intro video 14 min 32 sec.  The instructor never mentioned that this is a two part course. 

He did say the course was an Udemy clone that has 70% of the features of Udemy, but never did say it was incomplete and is only part one. If I knew this I would never have bought this.

So after paying for the course and coming back to Udemy I find a Welcome email, this is normal and I do read the Welcome emails. 
I will paste the email in full so you can see the line where he states this is part one of the course.
Quote:
Hello dear student,

Thank you so much for enrolling in this course. My desire is that after completing this course, you will be able to build any CodeIgniter project you encounter. To reach this level, we have to work together, and that's why I would implore  you to start from the very beginning. 

- Note that, this is the part one of the course, we have part two also which complete and round up the course.

- Please take time to go through the videos in the course, watching as many times as you need. Implement every functionality before going to the next lesson. 

- Create a Github repository with your code and share with me so I keep track of your progress in the course. 

- Please ask questions in the discussion forum and I'll do my best to reply on time and help you.

If I do not deserve 5 star rating please let me improve and tell me exactly what went wrong so I can quickly adjust and please do rate us well so as to motivate us. Thanks

I wish you the best on this journey
Cheers,
UnQuote

I responded to this because to me this is very deceiving and should not be allowed. 

This is the instructor’s response to my message:

Quote
hello point of correction bro I never said the course is going to have another part and when you watch the introduction video I did mention that it is a course in series and if you can not wait till I complete the course that you should not join until the course is completed. I upload lessons everyday if not because of festive period.
UnQuote
I have been with Udemy since 2015 and bought 103 courses so I am not new to the system. This is the worst instructor out of all of my courses! I did not go through the course so I cannot say if he knows what he is talking about but from the welcome email and his response I can clearly see he is not being truthful with the public. I will also be reporting this to Udemy.

response.content:
Sorry you feel bad about the course. This is clearly mis-understanding.

I never said the course is going to have a part two but I did said it is a course in series.

As for the welcome message you received immediately you purchased this course, that was because I copied the welcome message for the school course with part and part two. I was trying to explain to you but it seems you already know too much.

Welcome message has been changed and the statement that talks about part two has been totally removed from this course. I love people with good listening hear but you already left and give your rating.

I try as much possible to give my students the best. What I promise I surely deliver. However stay away from this course if the purpose you purchased this course is to get the codes and sell for your clients. I love submissive students with good heart and students that are ready to learn.

When you go through the course content, you will observe right now the course is in series and soon we will complete the codes and complete source codes and database will be released.
response.content_html:
Sorry you feel bad about the course. This is clearly mis-understanding.

I never said the course is going to have a part two but I did said it is a course in series.

As for the welcome message you received immediately you purchased this course, that was because I copied the welcome message for the school course with part and part two. I was trying to explain to you but it seems you already know too much.

Welcome message has been changed and the statement that talks about part two has been totally removed from this course. I love people with good listening hear but you already left and give your rating.

I try as much possible to give my students the best. What I promise I surely deliver. However stay away from this course if the purpose you purchased this course is to get the codes and sell for your clients. I love submissive students with good heart and students that are ready to learn.

When you go through the course content, you will observe right now the course is in series and soon we will complete the codes and complete source codes and database will be released.
